Identification.LongTitle: Investment Limits (Trust and Loan Companies) Regulations

Provision.Text: Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Finance, pursuant to sections 452a, 467a and 531b of the Trust and Loan Companies Actc, hereby makes the annexed Investment Limits (Trust and Loan Companies) Regulations.

Section.Text: The following definitions apply in these Regulations.

Definition.Text: Act means the Trust and Loan Companies Act. (Loi)
designated entity means an entity other than

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: a joint venture;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: an insurance company;

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: a securities dealer; or

Paragraph.Label: (d)
Paragraph.Text: a subsidiary of an insurance company or securities dealer. (entité désignée)

Definition.Text: insurance company means an insurance company incorporated by or under the laws of Canada or a province. (société d’assurances)
joint venture means a real property entity

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: that was formed by a company, or by a designated entity controlled by a company, and one or more other persons for the purpose of a specific business undertaking;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: in which the company or designated entity has a substantial investment; and

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of which the persons who formed it have agreed on joint control, regardless of the distribution of their equity. (coentreprise)

Definition.Text: real property entity means an entity that is primarily engaged in holding, managing or otherwise dealing with

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: real property;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: shares of a body corporate that is primarily engaged in holding, managing or otherwise dealing with real property, including shares of a body corporate that is another real property entity; or

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: ownership interests in an unincorporated entity that is primarily engaged in holding, managing or otherwise dealing with real property, including ownership interests in an unincorporated entity that is another real property entity. (entité immobilière)

Definition.Text: related real property entity, in respect of a company, means

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: a real property entity, other than a designated entity controlled by the company, in which the company or a designated entity controlled by the company beneficially owns sufficient shares or ownership interests to cause the company or designated entity to have a substantial investment in the real property entity; or

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: a real property entity that is controlled by a real property entity described in paragraph (a). (entité immobilière apparentée)

Definition.Text: securities dealer means an entity described in paragraph (g) of the definition financial institution in section 2 of the Act. (négociant en valeurs mobilières)
third party, in respect of a company, means a person other than

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: the company;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: a designated entity controlled by the company; or

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: a related real property entity of the company. (tierce partie)

Section.MarginalNote: Book value of interest in real property
Section.Text: For the purposes of sections 8 to 11, the book value of an asset that is an interest of a company in real property, at a particular time, is

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: if the asset is real property, the gross book value of the real property, less any accumulated depreciation on the real property, that would be reported on a balance sheet of the company prepared as at that time in accordance with the accounting principles and specifications of the Superintendent referred to in subsection 313(4) of the Act; and

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: if the asset is a security or loan, the book value of the security or loan that would be reported on a balance sheet of the company prepared as at that time in accordance with the accounting principles and specifications of the Superintendent referred to in subsection 313(4) of the Act.

Section.Text: Sections 464 to 466 of the Act do not apply to

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: a widely held company with equity of five billion dollars or more; or

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: a company with equity of five billion dollars or more that is controlled by

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: a widely held bank holding company;

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: a widely held insurance holding company;

Subparagraph.Label: (iii)
Subparagraph.Text: an eligible financial institution, as defined in section 370 of the Bank Act, other than a foreign bank as defined in section 2 of that Act; or

Subparagraph.Label: (iv)
Subparagraph.Text: a foreign bank, as defined in section 2 of the Bank Act, that is widely held as defined in section 2.3 of that Act.

Section.Text: For the purposes of sections 464 to 466 of the Act, a prescribed subsidiary of a company is a subsidiary of the company other than

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: an insurance company;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: a securities dealer; or

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: a subsidiary of an insurance company or securities dealer.

Subsection.Text: For the purposes of sections 464 and 465 of the Act, the prescribed percentage is 70%.
For the purpose of section 466 of the Act, the prescribed percentage is 100%.

Section.Text: For the purposes of sections 465 and 466 of the Act, the value of the participating shares and ownership interests referred to in those sections that are beneficially owned by a company and its subsidiaries prescribed by section 4 is equal to their book value as reported on the consolidated balance sheet of the company.

Heading.TitleText: Interests of a Company in Real Property

Section.MarginalNote: Definition and value of interest in real property

Subsection.Text: For the purposes of Part IX of the Act, other than subsection 460(3) of the Act, sections 8 to 12 define the interests of a company in real property and set out how those interests are to be valued.

For the purpose of subsection 460(3) of the Act, the interests of a company in real property means real property referred to in paragraph 11(1)(a) and shares and ownership interests referred to in paragraph 11(1)(b) that become beneficially owned by the company, or by a designated entity controlled by the company, as a result of the realization of a security interest on a loan or debt obligation referred to in subsection 11(1).

Heading.TitleText: Direct Interests — Real Property and Debt Obligations

Subsection.Text: The following are interests of a company in real property:

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: real property beneficially owned by the company or by a designated entity controlled by the company; and

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: a debt obligation, for which the company or a designated entity controlled by the company is liable, that was issued for the purpose of acquiring or improving real property referred to in paragraph (a).

Subsection.Text: The value of the interests of a company in real property is

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of real property referred to in paragraph (1)(a), the book value of the real property; and

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of a debt obligation referred to in paragraph (1)(b), any amount by which the book value of the debt obligation exceeds the book value of the real property referred to in that paragraph.

Heading.TitleText: Indirect Interests — Real Property, Shares and Ownership Interests

Subsection.Text: The following are interests of a company in real property:

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: at a particular time, real property

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: that is beneficially owned by

Clause.Label: (A)
Clause.Text: a related real property entity of the company that is a joint venture, or

Clause.Label: (B)
Clause.Text: an entity in which an entity described in clause (A) has a substantial investment, and

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: that would be reported on a balance sheet of the company prepared as at that time in accordance with the accounting principles and specifications of the Superintendent referred to in subsection 313(4) of the Act; and

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: shares and ownership interests beneficially owned by the company, or by a designated entity controlled by the company, in any related real property entity of the company other than a related real property entity referred to in paragraph (a).

Subsection.Text: The value of the interests of a company in real property is

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of real property referred to in paragraph (1)(a), the book value of the real property; and

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of shares and ownership interests referred to in paragraph (1)(b), the book value of the shares and ownership interests.

Heading.TitleText: Indirect Interests — Loans and Debt Obligations

Subsection.Text: The following are interests of a company in real property:

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: a debt obligation issued by a related real property entity of the company and beneficially owned by the company or by a designated entity controlled by the company;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: a loan made by the company, or by a designated entity controlled by the company, to a related real property entity of the company;

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: a loan made by the company, or by a designated entity controlled by the company, to

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: a real property entity in which a securities dealer or insurance company controlled by the company has a substantial investment, or

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: a real property entity that is controlled by a real property entity described in subparagraph (i);

Paragraph.Label: (d)
Paragraph.Text: a debt obligation issued by a real property entity described in subparagraph (c)(i) or (ii) and beneficially owned by the company or by a designated entity controlled by the company;

Paragraph.Label: (e)
Paragraph.Text: a debt obligation that is

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: issued by a related real property entity of the company,

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: beneficially owned by a third party, and

Subparagraph.Label: (iii)
Subparagraph.Text: guaranteed by the company or by a designated entity controlled by the company; and

Paragraph.Label: (f)
Paragraph.Text: a loan made by a third party to a related real property entity of the company and guaranteed by the company or by a designated entity controlled by the company.

Subsection.Text: The value of the interests of a company in real property is

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of a debt obligation referred to in paragraph (1)(a) or (d), the book value of the debt obligation;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of a loan referred to in paragraph (1)(b) or (c), the book value of the loan; and

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of a guaranteed debt obligation referred to in paragraph (1)(e) or a guaranteed loan referred to in paragraph (1)(f),

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: if the debt obligation is issued by, or the loan is made to, an entity that is a related real property entity of the company and the entity beneficially owns real property that is an interest of the company in real property under paragraph 9(1)(a), any amount by which the face value of the guarantee exceeds the value of the real property determined in accordance with paragraph 9(2)(a), and

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: in any other case, the face value of the guarantee.

Heading.TitleText: Indirect Interests — Secured Loans and Debt Obligations

Subsection.Text: If a company or a designated entity controlled by a company makes a loan to, or beneficially owns or guarantees the debt obligation of, a third party, the loan or debt obligation is an interest of the company in real property if it is secured by

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: real property beneficially owned by a third party in conjunction with

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: the company,

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: the designated entity,

Subparagraph.Label: (iii)
Subparagraph.Text: a related real property entity of the company,

Subparagraph.Label: (iv)
Subparagraph.Text: a securities dealer or insurance company controlled by the company,

Subparagraph.Label: (v)
Subparagraph.Text: an entity controlled by a securities dealer or insurance company referred to in subparagraph (iv), or

Subparagraph.Label: (vi)
Subparagraph.Text: a real property entity described in subparagraph 10(1)(c)(i) or (ii); or

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: shares or ownership interests beneficially owned by a third party in

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: an entity that beneficially owns real property in conjunction with the company, a related real property entity of the company or a designated entity controlled by the company, or

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: a related real property entity of the company.

Subsection.Text: The value of the interests of a company in real property is

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of a loan or debt obligation that is secured by real property referred to in paragraph (1)(a), the lesser of

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: the net realizable value of the third party’s interest in the real property at the time that the security interest was given, and

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: the amount determined by the formula

FormulaParagraph.Label: (A)
FormulaParagraph.Text: if the loan was made by the company or a designated entity controlled by the company or the debt obligation is beneficially owned by the company or a designated entity controlled by the company, the book value of the loan or debt obligation, or

FormulaParagraph.Label: (B)
FormulaParagraph.Text: if the debt obligation is guaranteed by the company or a designated entity controlled by the company, the face value of the guarantee, and

FormulaDefinition.Text: is the total net realizable value of any other security interests that were given for the loan or debt obligation;

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of a loan or debt obligation that is secured by shares or ownership interests beneficially owned by a third party in an entity referred to in subparagraph (1)(b)(i), the lesser of

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: the net realizable value of the third party’s interest in those shares or ownership interests at the time that the security interest was given, and

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: the amount determined by the formula

FormulaParagraph.Label: (A)
FormulaParagraph.Text: if the loan was made by the company or a designated entity controlled by the company or the debt obligation is beneficially owned by the company or a designated entity controlled by the company, the book value of the loan or debt obligation, or

FormulaParagraph.Label: (B)
FormulaParagraph.Text: if the debt obligation is guaranteed by the company or a designated entity controlled by the company, the face value of the guarantee,

FormulaDefinition.Text: is the total net realizable value of all security interests that were given for the loan or debt obligation,
is the net realizable value of the entity’s interest in the real property referred to in subparagraph (1)(b)(i),
is the value of the shares or ownership interests that are given as the security interest,
is the total value of the outstanding shares or ownership interests in the entity; and

Paragraph.Label: (c)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of a loan or debt obligation that is secured by shares or ownership interests beneficially owned by a third party in a related real property entity referred to in subparagraph (1)(b)(ii), the lesser of

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: the net realizable value of the third party’s interest in those shares or ownership interests at the time that the security interest was given, and

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: the amount determined by the formula

FormulaParagraph.Label: (A)
FormulaParagraph.Text: if the loan was made by the company or a designated entity controlled by the company or the debt obligation is beneficially owned by the company or a designated entity controlled by the company, the book value of the loan or debt obligation, or

FormulaParagraph.Label: (B)
FormulaParagraph.Text: if the debt obligation is guaranteed by the company or a designated entity controlled by the company, the face value of the guarantee, and

FormulaDefinition.Text: is the total net realizable value of any other security interests that were given for the loan or debt obligation.

Subsection.Text: The following are interests of a company in real property:

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: a guarantee given by the company, or by a designated entity controlled by the company, to an entity other than the company or designated entity for the purpose of completing the development of real property that is beneficially owned by

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: the company,

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: a designated entity controlled by the company, or

Subparagraph.Label: (iii)
Subparagraph.Text: a related real property entity of the company; and

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: an agreement made by the company, or by a designated entity controlled by the company, to support a third party’s cost of operating or financing real property that is beneficially owned by

Subparagraph.Label: (i)
Subparagraph.Text: the company,

Subparagraph.Label: (ii)
Subparagraph.Text: a designated entity controlled by the company, or

Subparagraph.Label: (iii)
Subparagraph.Text: a related real property entity of the company.

Subsection.Text: The value of the interests of a company in real property is

Paragraph.Label: (a)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of a guarantee referred to in paragraph (1)(a), the estimated cost of completing the development of the real property; and

Paragraph.Label: (b)
Paragraph.Text: in respect of an agreement referred to in paragraph (1)(b), the amount of any funds advanced by the company, or by a designated entity controlled by the company, under the agreement.

Section.Text: These Regulations come into force on the day on which sections 452 and 467 of the Trust and Loan Companies Act, as enacted by section 550 of the Financial Consumer Agency of Canada Act, chapter 9 of the Statutes of Canada, 2001, come into force.

Footnote.Text: [Note: Regulations in force October 24, 2001, see SI/2001-102.]
